name: Inugami Rush: A Boss Rush
description:
Alaeun, a world where the traditional society coincides with modern technology... a world where magic is a gift, and not all are gifted.

A lone mansion in Alaeun by the name of "the House of Inugamis" has recently been slandered with rumors... people believe that the mansion, also operating as an orphanage, has been secretly raising their children to assemble an army to take over Alaeun. Our protagonists- a head shrine maiden of a neighboring city, the daughter of the shrine maiden, a bounty hunter rabbit, and the mother of the orphanage herself- all head out to debunk the rumors.

Features:

  • 4 playable characters
  • 9* bosses to fight in a boss-rush format, one after another (*10 if you include the mini-boss at the start).
  • Custom made player and boss sprite graphics and spell patterns. Each player has a different feel, and each boss has a theme as the difficulty gets harder and harder.
  • Three difficulties
    • Easy, for those of you unfamiliar with bullet hells in general.
    • Normal, for those that are familiar with bullet hells. The expected difficulty of this game.
    • Lunatic, we skipped Hard mode and decided on this. Normal wasn't hard enough, was it?

I made this as a gift to my boyfriend, since all the characters in the boss rush (excluding the mid-boss) are his characters. I hope you enjoy!

If you have any questions or feedback, contact me via Twitter (https://twitter.com/LeverPivot) or Steam (https://steamcommunity.com/id/VNsforLife/)!
